hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Right Bottom Fake Wal: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: When all else fails, use Fire.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Minuet of Forest# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that in the Forest Temple you can reach the alcove in the block push room with Hover Boots?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #an Ocarina#.
